Notes: The monkey NPC who will prompt the player to play a scoring minigame where one has to defeat as many Gummits as possible. The minigame controller (MameMuimuiScorer or MameMuimuiScorerLv2) needs to be linked to it using GeneratorId. It will register a Power Star, however, this requires a properly configured Scenario entry. A complex dialogue with flow nodes needs to be set up as well.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: Activated or deactivated depending on the used event flow node.

SW_B.Description: Activated or deactivated depending on the used event flow node.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

MarioFaceShipNpcRegister.Description: This object can be registered to a Starship Mario NPC appearance event.

AppearPowerStar.Description: Gets spawned after triggering its EventFunc.

Message.Description: The text message ID to be used. Needs to be specified in the zone's text file.

EventFunc.Description: Object-specific behavior for EventFunc event flow nodes.

Values.Notes: Replace number variable with player's score
Replace number variable with minimum score

AnimeFunc.Description: Object-specific behavior for AnimeFunc event flow nodes.

BranchFunc.Description: Object-specific behavior for BranchFunc branch flow nodes.

YoshiLockOnTarget.Description: This object can be targeted and licked by Yoshi.
